mapper.select: select * from cart where itemId= #{itemId } and memberId= #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(idx, memberId, ip, itemid, itemCount, itemPrice, cartDate, url, itemName) values(cart_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{ip}, #{itemId}, #{itemCount}, #{itemPrice}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd' ), #{url}, #{itemName} )
mapper.update: update cart set itemCount = #{itemCount} where itemId = #{itemId} and memberId = #{memberId}
